title: Kamala Harris Shakes Hands With Trump As Rivals Meet For 1st Time
content: Ahead of a game-changing presidential debate, US Vice President and Democratic nominee Kamala Harris walked over to her Republican rival Donald Trump and shook hands with him.
summary: Ahead of a game-changing presidential debate, US Vice President and Democratic nominee Kamala Harris walked over to her Republican rival Donald Trump and shook hands with him.

title: "It Was Three On One": Trump's 1st Reaction After Debate With Kamala Harris
content: Republican presidential candidate Donald Trump said his Tuesday showdown with Democrat Kamala Harris was his "best debate ever," and accused the ABC network moderators of working against him.
summary: Republican presidential candidate Donald Trump said his Tuesday showdown with Democrat Kamala Harris was his "best debate ever," and accused the ABC network moderators of working against him.

title: "You're Running Against Me, Not Biden": Kamala Harris' Reminder To Trump
content: Democratic Presidential nominee Kamala Harris presented herself as the face of a new generation of leadership as she reminded her Republican rival Donald Trump that he was contesting against her, and not President Joe Biden.
summary: Democratic Presidential nominee Kamala Harris presented herself as the face of a new generation of leadership as she reminded her Republican rival Donald Trump that he was contesting against her, and not President Joe Biden.

title: Taylor Swift Endorses Kamala Harris For US President, Says She's A "Warrior"
content: Pop superstar Taylor Swift on Tuesday endorsed Democrat Kamala Harris in the US presidential contest against Donald Trump, saying she was a "warrior."
summary: Pop superstar Taylor Swift on Tuesday endorsed Democrat Kamala Harris in the US presidential contest against Donald Trump, saying she was a "warrior."

title: Key Quotes From The First Harris-Trump Presidential Debate
content: US Vice President Kamala Harris and former President Donald Trump took the stage on Tuesday night for their first and only scheduled presidential debate before the Nov. 5 election.
summary: US Vice President Kamala Harris and former President Donald Trump took the stage on Tuesday night for their first and only scheduled presidential debate before the Nov. 5 election.

title: Key Takeaways From The First Kamala Harris-Donald Trump Presidential Debate
content: Democrat Kamala Harris and Republican Donald Trump met on Tuesday for their first and perhaps only debate, a square-off that could have a significant impact on the Nov. 5 election as polls show a tight race.
summary: Democrat Kamala Harris and Republican Donald Trump met on Tuesday for their first and perhaps only debate, a square-off that could have a significant impact on the Nov. 5 election as polls show a tight race.

title: New Atlas of Martian Clouds Reveals A Diverse Atmosphere
content: Despite its thin atmosphere composed primarily of carbon dioxide, Mars can produce striking cloud formations when conditions are right,
summary: Despite its thin atmosphere composed primarily of carbon dioxide, Mars can produce striking cloud formations when conditions are right,

title: Israel Shares Video Of Cramped Tunnel Where Hostages Were Held And Killed
content: Blood on the ground of a dark, cramped tunnel sealed by an iron door, bullets and a chess set are seen in a video released by the Israeli military of the passageway deep underground where it said six slain hostages were held and killed by Hamas.
summary: Blood on the ground of a dark, cramped tunnel sealed by an iron door, bullets and a chess set are seen in a video released by the Israeli military of the passageway deep underground where it said six slain hostages were held and killed by Hamas.

title: Trump Repeats De-Bunked Migrants Eating "Dogs, Cats" Story. Harris Laughs
content: Republican nominee Donald Trump vilified immigrants in his presidential debate Tuesday with Democrat Kamala Harris.
summary: Republican nominee Donald Trump vilified immigrants in his presidential debate Tuesday with Democrat Kamala Harris.

title: Harris Slams Trump For Leaving America In A "Mess", Says She Cleaned It Up
content: US Vice President and Democrat presidential candidate Kamala Harris today clashed with former President and Republican rival Donald Trump over several issues faced by Americans.
summary: US Vice President and Democrat presidential candidate Kamala Harris today clashed with former President and Republican rival Donald Trump over several issues faced by Americans.

title: Kamala Harris Says Donald Trump Will Sign Abortion Ban. He Responds
content: Democratic Presidential nominee Kamala Harris has claimed that his Republican rival Donald Trump would sign the national abortion ban if he becomes the President, as the two leaders faced off in the first televised debate in Philadelphia.
summary: Democratic Presidential nominee Kamala Harris has claimed that his Republican rival Donald Trump would sign the national abortion ban if he becomes the President, as the two leaders faced off in the first televised debate in Philadelphia.

title: US Jury Awards $50 Million To Man After 10 Years Of Wrongful Conviction
content: A US jury has awarded $50 million in damages to a man who spent nearly 10 years in prison after being wrongfully convicted of murder, his lawyers said Tuesday.
summary: A US jury has awarded $50 million in damages to a man who spent nearly 10 years in prison after being wrongfully convicted of murder, his lawyers said Tuesday.

title: Explosion At US-Led Coalition Base In Iraq Ahead Of Iran President's Visit
content: Iraqi security forces said an explosion was heard at a US-led coalition's military base at the Baghdad International Airport late Tuesday, a day before Iran's president was due to visit.
summary: Iraqi security forces said an explosion was heard at a US-led coalition's military base at the Baghdad International Airport late Tuesday, a day before Iran's president was due to visit.

title: Western Powers Accuse Iran Of Escalating Russia Ukraine Conflict
content: Western powers on Tuesday announced fresh sanctions on Iran for supplying Russia with short-range missiles for imminent use against Ukraine, calling it a dangerous escalation of the conflict that threatened European security.
summary: Western powers on Tuesday announced fresh sanctions on Iran for supplying Russia with short-range missiles for imminent use against Ukraine, calling it a dangerous escalation of the conflict that threatened European security.

title: Trump Vows To End Russia-Ukraine War. "Putin Would Eat You," Says Harris
content: Eight weeks before the United States votes, Republic presidential candidate Donald Trump and his Democrat opponent Kamala Harris are now facing off in the presidential debate.

title: Amazon To Invest Over $10 Billion In UK In Boost For New Labour Government
content: US tech giant Amazon is to invest $10.5 billion in Britain over the next five years, creating thousands of jobs via its web services arm, the company and UK government announced Wednesday.
summary: US tech giant Amazon is to invest $10.5 billion in Britain over the next five years, creating thousands of jobs via its web services arm, the company and UK government announced Wednesday.

title: Top Tech Executives To Testify Before US Congress Over Election Threats
content: Executives from major tech firms like Google, Adobe, Microsoft and Meta Platforms will testify next week at a U.S. Senate Intelligence Committee hearing on election threats.
summary: Executives from major tech firms like Google, Adobe, Microsoft and Meta Platforms will testify next week at a U.S. Senate Intelligence Committee hearing on election threats.

title: Protesters Invade Mexican Senate, Forcing Halt To Reform Debate
content: Protesters invaded Mexico's Senate on Tuesday, forcing lawmakers to suspend a debate on controversial proposals by outgoing President Andres Manuel Lopez Obrador to allow voters to elect judges.
summary: Protesters invaded Mexico's Senate on Tuesday, forcing lawmakers to suspend a debate on controversial proposals by outgoing President Andres Manuel Lopez Obrador to allow voters to elect judges.

title: Highlights: "I'm Not Joe Biden. I'm Not Donald Trump": Kamala Harris
content: In a pivotal moment for the US presidential election campaign, former President Donald Trump and Democratic nominee Kamala Harris faced off in their first televised debate shortly in Pennsylvania.
summary: In a pivotal moment for the US presidential election campaign, former President Donald Trump and Democratic nominee Kamala Harris faced off in their first televised debate shortly in Pennsylvania.

title: Israel Says 3 Senior Hamas Leaders Killed In Gaza Attack
content: The Israeli military has said it had killed three senior Hamas militants in strikes on a designated safe zone in southern Gaza.
summary: The Israeli military has said it had killed three senior Hamas militants in strikes on a designated safe zone in southern Gaza.
